21  WDF2Reconstruct::WDF2Reconstruct(unsigned int window, unsigned int overlap, double thresh, double sigma, unsigned int ncoeff, enum WaveletThreshold::WaveletThresholding WTh)
22  :
23  mWindow(window),
24  mNCoeff(ncoeff),
25  mOverlap(overlap),
26  mStep(mWindow - mOverlap),
27  mThresh(thresh),
28  mSigma(sigma),
29  mSigmaH(sigma),
30  mSigmaBsC309(sigma),
31  mBuffer(1),
32  mBuff(1, mWindow),
33  mWtH(WaveletTransform::Haar),
34  mWTH(mWindow, mWtH),
35  mWtBsC309(WaveletTransform::BsplineC309),
36  mWTBsC309(mWindow, mWtBsC309),
37 
38  //mT( WaveletThreshold::dohonojohnston ),
39  mT(WTh),
40  mWavThres(mWindow, mWindow, sigma),
41 
42  mWindowing(mWindow),
43  mEvFF(mNCoeff) {
44  }

60  int WDF2Reconstruct::GetDataNeeded() {
61 
62  return mBuffer.Size() - mWindow;
63  }

72  void WDF2Reconstruct::SetData(Dmatrix& Data, double scale) {
73  mBuffer.AddPoints(Data, scale);
74  }

79  unsigned int WDF2Reconstruct::GetDataVector(double& abov, Dvector& Cmax, int& levelR, std::string& Wave) {
80  double varmax = 0.0;
81  Dvector cmax(mNCoeff);
82  int level;
83  double varH;
84  double varBsC309;
85  int levelH;
86  int levelBsC309;
87  Dvector cH(mNCoeff);
88  Dvector cBsC309(mNCoeff);
89  Cmax.resize(mNCoeff);
90 
91  if ((mWindow) > mBuffer.Size()) {
92  LogWarning("Not enough data points");
93  return 0;
94  }
95  //
96  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mWindow; i++) {
97  mBuff(0, i) = mBuffer(0, i);
98  }
99 
100  mWTH.Forward(mBuff);
101  mWavThres(mBuff, mT);
102 
103  mSigmaH = mWavThres.GetSigma();
104  levelH = mWavThres.GetLevel();
105  varH = 0.0;
106  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mWindow; i++) {
107  varH += (mBuff(0, i) * mBuff(0, i));
108  }
109 
110  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mNCoeff; i++) {
111  cH[i] = mBuff(0, i);
112 
113  }
114  //
115 
116  //
117  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mWindow; i++) {
118  mBuff(0, i) = mBuffer(0, i);
119  }
120 
121  mWTBsC309.Forward(mBuff);
122  mWavThres(mBuff, mT);
123 
124  mSigmaBsC309 = mWavThres.GetSigma();
125  levelBsC309 = mWavThres.GetLevel();
126 
127  varBsC309 = 0.0;
128 
129  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mWindow; i++) {
130 
131  varBsC309 += (mBuff(0, i) * mBuff(0, i));
132  }
133 
134  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mNCoeff; i++) {
135  cBsC309[i] = mBuff(0, i);
136 
137  }
138  //
139 
140  if (mSigmaH>0) {
141  varH = sqrt(varH) / (2.0*mSigmaH);
142  }
143  else
144  {
145  varH=0;
146  }
147 
148 
149  if (mSigmaBsC309>0) {
150  varBsC309 = sqrt(varBsC309) / (2.0*mSigmaBsC309);
151  }
152  else
153  {
154  varBsC309=0;
155  }
156 
157  varmax = varH;
158  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mNCoeff; i++) {
159  cmax[i] = cH[i];
160  }
161  level = levelH;
162  Wave = "Haar";
163 
164 
165 
166  // $$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$
167 
168 
169  // ###########33 BSPLINE ####################
170  if (varBsC309 >= varmax) {
171  varmax = varBsC309;
172  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mNCoeff; i++) {
173  cmax[i] = cBsC309[i];
174  }
175 
176  level = levelBsC309;
177  Wave = "BsplineC309";
178  }
179 
180  mBuffer.DelPoints(mStep);
181 
182 
183  if (varmax >= mThresh) {
184  abov = varmax;
185  levelR = level;
186  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mNCoeff; i++) {
187  Cmax[i] = cmax[i];
188 
189  }
190  return 1;
191  }
192  else
193 
194  return 0;
195 
196  }
197 
198 }
